thread.title: Crazy Monday: All 21 AP officers at Arabia Camp alive, Al-shabaab steal 4 BVR kits
thread.title_full: Crazy Monday: All 21 AP officers at Arabia Camp alive, Al-shabaab steal 4 BVR kits

title: Crazy Monday: All 21 AP officers at Arabia Camp alive, Al-shabaab steal 4 BVR kits
text:
Your are here » Home » Kenya All 21 AP officers at Arabia Camp alive, Al-shabaab steal 4 BVR kits By Mercy Asamba | Updated Thu, February 2nd 2017 at 13:09 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter Al-Shabaab Militants attack AP camp in Arabia, Mandera. (Photo: Courtesy) 
Interior CS Joseph Nkaissery clarifies that all 21 officers at Arabia AP Camp are alive, says 4 BVR kits and one vehicle stolen by the terrorists. 
The attackers destroyed communication masts in a strategic move to hinder communication between the police officers and other commanders. 
The gunmen also made away with four Biometric Voter Registration (BVR) kits.
